alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 4:29PM CDT until October 04 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Latimer County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northeastern Pittsburg County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Crowder, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Quinton... Crowder... Canadian... Arrowhead State Park... Blocker... Featherston... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
